description_html: The Valayo Collection offers a remarkable combination of striking design with superior strength and comfort. Chairs have both the wall-saver and clean-out design elements with replaceable or recoverable components for maximum sustainability. All units have incredible strength with a 2000 lb. static capacity and a 1000 lb. drop capacity and a Lifetime Warranty in the 24/7 environments. Three chair widths of 26, 32, & 46” comfortably accommodate all users and are available in both standard and armless versions. Brushed chrome and powder coat finishes are offered as well as urethane arm caps. Three bench sizes with arms or armless give design and function flexibility. Coordinating tables with a unique and durable wood top option as well as solid surface tops are all part of this striking collection.
